org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.topn

Class TopNPopularityMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.AbstractMetric<TopNPopularityMetric.Context,TopNPopularityMetric.Result,TopNPopularityMetric.Result>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Metric<TopNPopularityMetric.Context>

    public class TopNPopularityMetric
extends AbstractMetric<TopNPopularityMetric.Context,TopNPopularityMetric.Result,TopNPopularityMetric.Result>
    Metric that measures how popular the items in the TopN list are.

      • createContext

        public TopNPopularityMetric.Context createContext(Attributed algo,
                                         TTDataSet ds,
                                         Recommender rec)
        Description copied from interface: Metric
        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair).
        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithm.
        ds - The data set.
        rec - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to Metric.measureUser(TestUser, Object). If the metric does not accumulate any results, this method can return null.

      • doMeasureUser

        public TopNPopularityMetric.Result doMeasureUser(TestUser user,

        Parameters:

        context - The context.
        Returns:
